      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SegmentServiceExtensions.alias(SegmentService self, String from, String to, groovy.lang.Closure<?> builder)
      Alias method lets you merge two user profiles, including their actions and traits.
      static void SegmentServiceExtensions.group(SegmentService self, String userId, String groupId, groovy.lang.Closure<?> builder)
      Group method lets you associate a user with a group.
      static void SegmentServiceExtensions.identify(SegmentService self, String userId, groovy.lang.Closure<?> builder)
      identify lets you tie a user to their actions and record traits about them.
      static void SegmentServiceExtensions.page(SegmentService self, String userId, String name, groovy.lang.Closure<?> builder)
      Page method lets you record webpage visits from your web servers.
      static void SegmentServiceExtensions.screen(SegmentService self, String userId, String name, groovy.lang.Closure<?> builder)
      screen lets you record mobile screen views from your web servers.
      static void SegmentServiceExtensions.track(SegmentService self, String userId, String event, groovy.lang.Closure<?> builder)
      track lets you record the actions your users perform.
